title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, January 28, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of writer Colette (1873), who said, "What a wonderful life I've had! I only wish I'd realized it sooner."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of writer Colette (1873), who said, "What a wonderful life I've had! I only wish I'd realized it sooner."
